General_information.Content: This database contains data from international key comparisons for radionuclide metrology since the inception of the international system of reference (SIR) for radionuclide metrology at the BIPM in 1976.

References.key: Romain Coulon et al 2022 Meas. Sci. Technol. 33 024003 - https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6501/ac3fc4

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sr-85(2004)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Ratel G. and Michotte C., BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sr-85 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{85}$Sr, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/41/1A/06006}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2004, \textbf{41}, Tech. Suppl., 06006}

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sr-85(2005)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Ratel G., Michotte C. and Hino Y., Activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{85}$Sr for the NMIJ, Japan in the ongoing comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sr-85, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/42/1A/06010}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2005, \textbf{42}, Tech. Suppl., 06010}

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sr-85(2015)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Michotte C. Ratel G., Courte S., Dziel T. and Listkowska A., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sr-85 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{85}$Sr to include the 2009 result of the POLATOM (Poland), \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/52/1A/06022 }{\textit{Metrologia}, 2015, \textbf{52}, Tech. Suppl., 06022}

key.name: Eligible for the Key Comparison Reference Value (KCRV)

Laboratory.Full_name: Bureau International des Poids et Mesures
Laboratory.Address: Pavillon de Breteuil, F-92312 Sèvres Cedex

key.name: Activity measured by the laboratory / kBq
Date of the measurement by the BIPM international reference system (SIR)
Half-life used by the laboratory / d
Equivalent activity measured by the SIR / kBq
Relative standard uncertainty (SIR contribution) of the equivalent activity / 1e-4
Combined standard uncertainty of the equivalent activity / kBq
Initials of the person(s) who verified the data plus the date
